TEXT.TITLE: UAE CENTRAL BANK CD YIELDS UNCHANGED
TEXT.BODY: Yields on certificates of deposit (CDs) issued today by the United Arab Emirates central bank were unchanged from those on last Monday's offer, the bank said. The one month yield was set at last week's 6-3/4 pct, while two and three month CDs also remained unchanged at 6-13/16 pct. The six month yield was set at seven pct. REUTER
